name: Veteran
description: The Veteran is a formidable medium humanoid, embodying the archetype of a seasoned warrior. With a breastplate providing strong defense, this creature showcases significant combat experience.
memorable: Veterans are respected warriors, capable of leading and executing tactics in battle.
goals: To serve in battle for pay or to protect what they value, often leading smaller groups.
relations: Typically allied with soldiers, guards, or mercenaries and often leading tactical groups.
environment: Commonly found in military settings, battlefields, or as mercenaries in various locales.
strengths: High proficiency in melee combat, resilient with good defensive capabilities, and possesses tactical knowledge.
weaknesses: Average mental capabilities may limit strategic options outside direct combat.
attacks: Multiattack with longsword and shortsword options, or ranged attack with a heavy crossbow.
most_powerful_ability: Multiattack, allowing the Veteran to execute multiple melee attacks, significantly increasing damage potential.
equipment: Equipped with splint armor and various weapons including a longsword and shortsword.
senses: Possesses passive perception of 12, allowing it to be aware of hidden threats.
skills: Skilled in athletics and intimidation, capable of navigating survival situations and noticing details.
additional_information: Can execute Tactical Movement to reposition without provoking opportunity attacks.
Has a reaction called Off-Hand Counter to retaliate against missed melee attacks.
Possesses a shove ability to knock opponents prone, gaining tactical advantage.
Resilient saving throws, particularly strong against Strength and Constitution effects.
Adapts to various combat scenarios with versatility in weaponry.
